select DATA_STATUS,ID,IS_REVISED,MN,MONITOR_FACTOR_CODE,MONITOR_TIME,MONITOR_VALUE,REVISED_MONITOR_VALUE, SITE_CODE,STANDARD_VALUE,UPDATE_DATE,YXY_UPDATEDTIME,ADQ_UPDATE_TIME from QHSJ_ENTERPRISE_HOUR_DATA where 1=1
and SITE_CODE = #{id}
and MONITOR_FACTOR_CODE = #{MONITOR_FACTOR_CODE}
and MONITOR_TIME = to_date(#{time},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
and MONITOR_TIME >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
and MONITOR_TIME < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
order by MONITOR_TIME

SELECT t1.FACTOR_NAME AS NAME, NVL(t2.MONITOR_VALUE, -1) AS VALUE, t1.FACTOR_UNIT AS UNIT FROM ( ( SELECT FACTOR_NAME, FACTOR_CODE, FACTOR_UNIT, ROWNUM RN FROM QHSJ_ENTERPRISE_FACTOR_CODE ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MONITOR_VALUE, MONITOR_FACTOR_CODE FROM ( SELECT MONITOR_VALUE, MONITOR_FACTOR_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() over( partition by MONITOR_FACTOR_CODE order by MONITOR_TIME desc) RN FROM QHSJ_ENTERPRISE_HOUR_DATA WHERE SITE_CODE = #{siteCode} AND MONITOR_FACTOR_CODE IS NOT NULL ) WHERE RN = 1 ) t2 ON t1.FACTOR_CODE = t2.MONITOR_FACTOR_CODE ) ORDER BY t1.RN

select DATA_STATUS,ID,IS_REVISED,MN,MONITOR_FACTOR_CODE,MONITOR_TIME,MONITOR_VALUE,REVISED_MONITOR_VALUE, SITE_CODE,STANDARD_VALUE,UPDATE_DATE,YXY_UPDATEDTIME,ADQ_UPDATE_TIME from QHSJ_ENTERPRISE_DAY_DATA where 1=1
and SITE_CODE = #{id}
and MONITOR_FACTOR_CODE = #{MONITOR_FACTOR_CODE}
and MONITOR_TIME = to_date(#{time},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and MONITOR_TIME >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and MONITOR_TIME < to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-MM-dd')
order by MONITOR_TIME
